alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Grant (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 3:14PM PDT until July 10 at 4:00PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: The National Weather Service in Spokane has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Douglas County in north central Washington... Northeastern Grant County in north central Washington... * Until 400 PM PDT. * At 313 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles northwest of Lakeview, or 33 miles east of Wenatchee, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Banks Lake South, Lakeview, Soap Lake, Coulee City, Farmer, and Dry Falls Junction. This includes U.S. Highway 2 in Washington between mile markers 157 and 196. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
